title: Construction costs for selected airports up to 2012
summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Airport, and Costs in billion euros in each Airport on the y axis.
Airport Hong Kong (China) has the highest Costs in billion euros and Berlin-Brandenburg (Germany) has the lowest Costs in billion euros.
The difference of Costs in billion euros between the highest and lowest Airport is 12.9.
min_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Airport, and Costs in billion euros in each Airport on the y axis.
The Costs in billion euros is appeared to be the highest at Airport Hong Kong (China) and lowest at Airport Berlin-Brandenburg (Germany).
